=== About Shwe Tun ===

Hi, I am Shwe Tun, I Love {*} , I'm Christian, I live in Pakkku the middle state of Myanmar(Burma), I Love Ubuntu and Traveling with Ubuntu Install Fest / Ubuntu Promote Event, 

I am currently a Freelancer (Net/Web). I have a strong interest in computers, especially Net and web programming. I Love it Ubuntu and other OSS, FLOSS, GNU, GPL, MIT, Apache etc.,

I learned HTML/JS/CSS by myself in 2000, and moved on to PHP a couple of years later.However, I have now decided to use WordPress and Drupal for all my Blog and Web, as it is a lot easier and much more powerful.

I am member of <nowiki>[[MyanmarTeam|Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team]]</nowiki>, mainly helping out with the Facebook groups and Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team Movement. and the biggest <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BarCamp | Barcamp]]</nowiki> in   <nowiki>[[http://barcampyangon.org| Barcamp Yangon]]</nowiki> (With Our LoCo Team Member) and BCY-13 at Assistant Coordinator.
